developerHint.title: Developer hint
developerHint.note: Note: This hint is only shown in development mode.

buildCheck.soon: A new version of the developer portal will be available soon.
buildCheck.reload: To see the new version, reload the page now.

400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Not Found
404.message: The requested resource could not be found.

405.title: Method Not Allowed
405.message: The request method is not supported for the requested resource.

414.title: Request URI Too Large
414.message: The request URI is too large.

416.title: Range Not Satisfiable
416.message: The server cannot satisfy the request range.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: An unexpected error occurred while processing your request.

501.title: Not Implemented
501.message: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.message: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: The server is temporarily unable to handle the request.

504.title: Gateway Timeout
504.message: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.

default.title: An error occurred
default.message: Something went wrong while processing your request.
